ratings.notes: [proposed_contextual_controlled] Here at East Watch Gate and while on observing duty, I cannot approve answer royal archive right until verification is complete.<TAB>5<TAB>4<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>4<TAB>Ensure protocol for access to the archives.
[proposed_contextual] I need a clearer request before I can respond in character.<TAB>2<TAB>1<TAB>2<TAB>3<TAB>2<TAB>Needs more specificity and context about why you're asking for archive access.

[candidate_no_context] I'm sorry, but access to the archives requires a special pass and clearance from within these walls.<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>Directs attention to necessary credentials for archive entry.
[baseline_no_context] Access to the archives requires a special pass, and without one, you cannot enter.<TAB>5<TAB>5<TAB>2<TAB>3<TAB>
"Response is relevant but lacks urgency and suspicion fitting for a Gatekeeper persona."
